title: What are the things that make someone objectively beautiful? - Quora

response.answer_text: Their honesty and by honesty i dont mean snitching, i mean being proud of their mistakes so as to not hide them. By being passionate about every little thing like spending the entire night under the stars just so they can spot their favourite shooting stars. By being original and smiling and laughing and getting hyper when they choose to no matter the age or time and being in touch with their emotions. By just being themselves and being in love with their true selves.

There’s no objective definition of beauty. But human beings are wired to consider their fellow human beings attractive if the later have highly symmetrical faces that are as close to average as possible. Because of this, most human beings are reasonably attractive; it is not a minority trait.
